name: Juliano Iyoda
content: Juliano Iyoda Juliano Iyoda PhD, University of Cambridge Courses Research Short CV Research I am interested in Formal Methods applied to hardware and software design, automated reasoning (in particular, the HOL theorem proving system) and Testing. A list of publications can be found here. Courses Computação Eletrônica História e Futuro da Computação Short CV Current - Associate Professor at the Centro de Informática, Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Brazil 2002-2006 - PhD at the Computer Laboratory, University of Cambridge, UK 2000-2001 - Fellow at the International Institute for Software Technology, the United Nations University, China 1994-2000 - BSc and MSc at Centro de Informática, Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Brazil For a Lattes CV (in Portuguese), click here.
